# About <a href="https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.15"><img align="right" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/CMake-3.15-BA1F28?logo=CMake" alt="CMake 3.15" /></a><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C_(programming_language)"><img align="right" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/C-11-A5B4C6?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64," alt="C 11" /></a>

**Risa** is an embeddable and modular scripting language.
